metadata.title: CVE-2024-44960 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: gadget: core: Check for unset descriptorMake sure the descriptor has been set before looking at maxpacket.This fixes a null pointer panic in this case.This may happen if the gadget doesn't properly set up the endpointfor the current speed, or the gadget descriptors are malformed andthe descriptor for the speed/endpoint are not found.No current gadget driver is known to have this problem, but thismay cause a hard-to-find bug during development of new gadgets.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
